title: Blair X
description: Sequel to Church ChickBlair Brown is determined to get Tobin Peterson to fall in love with her now he's committed to Sabrina Sloan. Just when Blair thinks she has it all figured out, tragedy hits and Blair is forced to move in with Sabrina's family - Charles, Helen Trisha Sloan. Underneath Blair's nose, Trisha devises a scheme to rid Blair from their lives and Sabrina hatches her plan.Everyone has a secret, yet to be revealed.What will Blair do now the tables are turned and the Sloans are on the attack?
author: Michelle Carey
